alert.note: Alert for Adams; Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 22 at 8:03PM CDT until April 30 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi...Louisiana... Mississippi River At Natchez affecting Wilkinson and Adams Counties and Concordia Parish. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING TO SATURDAY, APRIL 30TH... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mississippi River At Natchez. * WHEN...From Sunday evening to Saturday, April 30th. * IMPACTS...At 48 feet, Carthage Point Road becomes impassable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CDT Friday the stage was 46.5 feet and rising. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Sunday evening and crest early next week. - Flood stage is 48 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Mississippi River Natchez 48.0 46.5 Fri 7 pm CDT 47.4 48.0 48.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Saturday morning.
